How about a giant fireball that moves only slowly
across the battlefield, damaging anyone foolish enough
to run into it? It would totally torch blobs and
clerics...

The giant skeletons need a new tileset. As it is, they
look totally out of place and their movement sucks.
They're always facing forward and the stones they
throw seem to just magically appear in front of them.
Think this is a problem we can tackle? The character
tiles can be altered by anyone here with editor.exe...
   -Tevildo, Prince of Cats.
